_sText: Because of bugs and problems of zm_lost-base, I try to fix all so I need to make new map.... I add a "bonus room" out of map and I also add more light. The tall of map is 3,19 Mo (3 345 564 octets) You can see the zm_lost-base version 1 here : http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/46852 http//www.biokoxomodding.tk
